disease: Malignant neoplasm of overlapping sites of bone and articular cartilage of right limb

symptoms.name: Pain
symptoms.pattern: May be present or absent; can be severe if bone fracture occurs

symptoms.name: Weakness
symptoms.pattern: Can range from mild to severe depending on the extent of the disease

symptoms.name: Bone fracture
symptoms.pattern: Can occur due to weakening of the bone by the tumor

symptoms.name: General unwellness
symptoms.pattern: Can be present, especially in cases of rapidly progressing cancer

required: Imaging evidence of malignant neoplasm involving both bone and articular cartilage of the right limb
